CustomField.formula: IF( APT_Price_Structure__c =='BASE+PER_KG {Z30}' || APT_Price_Structure__c =='BASE+PER_KG {Z40}','Base + Per KG', IF( APT_Price_Structure__c =='BANDED {Z30}' || APT_Price_Structure__c =='BANDED {Z40}' || APT_Price_Structure__c =='BANDED {Z6}','BANDED', IF( APT_Price_Structure__c =='BANDED SPECIAL EXPRESS {Z40}' ,'BANDED SPECIAL EXPRESS', IF( APT_Price_Structure__c =='WINE {Z30}' ,'DOMESTIC WINE' , IF( APT_Price_Structure__c =='BANDED WINE {Z40}','WINE','')))))
CustomField.label: Price Structure Without Zone
